title: Twenty-five years of research on resting-state fMRI of major depressive disorder: A bibliometric analysis of hotspots, nodes, bursts, and trends
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Linhan Fu, Mengjing Cai, Yao Zhao, Zhihui Zhang, Qian Qian, Hui Xue, Yayuan Chen, Zuhao Sun, Qiyu Zhao, Shaoying Wang, Chunyang Wang, Wenqin Wang, Yifan Jiang, Yuxuan Tian, Juanwei Ma, Wenbin Guo, Feng Liu
